alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Ohio (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:01AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL BELMONT... SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN GREENE...OHIO AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM EDT... At 700 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Triadelphia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Martins Ferry, Bellaire, Warwood, Bethlehem, Triadelphia, Clearview, Valley Grove, McMechen, Benwood, Yorkville, and West Finley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
